mapper.select: SELECT * from (SELECT user_info.gender,user_info.education,user_info.salary,user_info.height,user_info.age,user_photo.pic1 FROM user_info LEFT JOIN user_photo ON user_info.id=user_photo.id and user_photo.pic1!='无图片') a where a.pic1 is not NULL and a.gender='女' and a.height='173' and a.age='32' LIMIT 1
